data.name: Black Panther (Shuri)
data.description: Following the untimely death of her brother, T'Challa, Shuri synthesized the heart-shaped herb to become the new defender of Wakanda.

starItems.name: Black Panther (Shuri)
starItems.description: Following the untimely death of her brother, T'Challa, Shuri synthesized the heart-shaped herb to become the new defender of Wakanda.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, if this character has <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to primary and adjacent targets

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, if this character has <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, if this character has <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to primary and adjacent targets

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, if this character has <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, if this character has <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to primary and adjacent targets

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, if this character has <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>230%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, if this character has <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE DEFENSE</color>, this attack targets the enemy <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color> with the most Speed Bar, instead, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

This attack can Chain to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> targets, Counterattack breaks this Chain, and this attack gains +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus and cannot be blocked.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies, this attack is Unavoidable.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to the primary target

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE DEFENSE</color>, this attack targets the enemy <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color> with the most Speed Bar, instead, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

This attack can Chain to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> targets, Counterattack breaks this Chain, and this attack gains +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus and cannot be blocked.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies, this attack is Unavoidable.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>110%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> <color=#fff568>DEFENSE</color>, this attack targets the enemy <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color> with the most Speed Bar, instead, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

This attack can Chain to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> targets, Counterattack breaks this Chain, and this attack gains +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus and cannot be blocked.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies, this attack is Unavoidable.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, clear all <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on the primary target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
> Clear all <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on the primary target.
> On <color=#fff568>DEFENSE</color>, this attack targets the enemy <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color> with the most Speed Bar, instead, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

This attack can Chain to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> targets, Counterattack breaks this Chain, and this attack gains +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus and cannot be blocked.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies, this attack is Unavoidable.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>170%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
> Clear all <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on the primary target.
> Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies.
> On <color=#fff568>DEFENSE</color>, this attack targets the enemy <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color> with the most Speed Bar, instead, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

This attack can Chain to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> targets, Counterattack breaks this Chain, and this attack gains +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus and cannot be blocked.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies, this attack is Unavoidable.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Crit Chance for this attack

This attack can Chain to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> targets, Counterattack breaks this Chain, and this attack gains +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus and cannot be blocked.

6.nextUpgrade:

Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
> Clear all <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on the primary target.

> On <color=#fff568>DEFENSE</color>, this attack targets the enemy <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color> with the most Speed Bar, instead, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

This attack can Chain to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> targets, Counterattack breaks this Chain, and this attack gains +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus and cannot be blocked.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies, this attack gains +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Crit Chance and is Unavoidable.

1.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, repeat this attack.

Lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, repeat this attack.

Lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
2.nextUpgrade: For each <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> time, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color> Bonus Attacks

3.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing.

For each <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> time, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color> Bonus Attacks.

Lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing.

For each <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> time, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color> Bonus Attacks.

Lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing.

For each <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> time, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color> Bonus Attacks.

Lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all adjacent targets
For each <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> time, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> Bonus Attacks

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all adjacent targets.

For each <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> time, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> Bonus Attacks.

Lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to the primary target
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to all adjacent targets
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to the primary target.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>260%</color> Piercing.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to all adjacent targets.

For each <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> time, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> Bonus Attacks.

Lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

1.description:
On Spawn, before other characters' On Spawn effects, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

On Attacked, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > When an <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> ally is attacked, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > While this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lower the Assist Chance for all enemies by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.

2.description:
On Spawn, before other characters' On Spawn effects, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

On Attacked, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > When an <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> ally is attacked, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > While this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lower the Assist Chance for all enemies by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
2.nextUpgrade: On Kill, clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects from all enemies

3.description:
On Spawn, before other characters' On Spawn effects, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

On Attacked, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

On Kill, clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects from all enemies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > When an <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> ally is attacked, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > While this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lower the Assist Chance for all enemies by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
On <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to all enemies
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, while this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>

4.description:
On Spawn, before other characters' On Spawn effects, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

On Attacked, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

On <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to all enemies.

On Kill, clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects from all enemies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > When an <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> ally is attacked, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > While this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lower the Assist Chance for all enemies by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
 > While this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
Lower Max Barrier of all enemies by <color=#86e619>10%</color>
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, lower Max Barrier of all enemies by an additional <color=#86e619>10%</color>
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus for self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies.

5.description:
On Spawn, before other characters' On Spawn effects, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

On Attacked, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
Lower Max Barrier of all enemies by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > When an <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> ally is attacked, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > Lower Max Barrier of all enemies by an additional <color=#86e619>10%</color>.
